Microsoft $MSFT is said to be rolling out a ranking system for AI models based on safety performance, letting cloud customers assess different AI models before use.

$GOOG $AMZN $META

CoreWeave $CRWV is said to be providing compute capacity to Google Cloud $GOOG, which will then sell that to OpenAI to help it meet growing demand for ChatGPT.

GCP is also providing some of its own compute to OpenAI, per Reuters.

Nvidia $NVDA CEO Jensen Huang predicted that Europe's AI compute capacity will increase by 10x over the next two years.
